item.title: UGC - Unboxing and Product Review - 30-40 Seconds - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a female actress/content creator, ideally aged between 25-35, for an exciting project producing User Generated Content (UGC) videos.

Ideal Candidate:
- Aged 25-40, female.
- Must be a charismatic and confident person.
- Ability to produce high-quality, bespoke videos.
- Experience in acting is preferred, but not necessary. Influencers who know how to work with a camera and can provide high-quality videos are also encouraged to apply.

Scope of Work: The successful candidate will be required to create 1 short video, about a 30-40 seconds long. The brand is startup better-for-you brand.

Application Process:
- Please submit a video portfolio of your previous work, showcasing your ability to create high-quality videos and, if possible, any acting or influencing experience.
- Even if you're not a professional actor, as long as you know how to work with the camera and can deliver quality videos, you're welcome to apply.

Support
The selected candidate will receive an influencer deck to help with content creation, we would also encourage the creator to meet with the team to learn an understand the story behind the brand.

Usage
The content produced is to be used on social media and to advertise the brand. We may use parts of the content in other content, but we must be careful not to distort the integrity of the content.

We look forward to reviewing your submissions and discussing the opportunity to collaborate on this exciting project!

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: KC Videographer for 7/16 Keynote - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled videographer to record our upcoming keynote speaking event at Argosy Casino. The videographer will be responsible for capturing high-quality footage of my 1-hour talk from two angles, syncing to audio, and delivering color-corrected, professional recordings. No post-production is needed except this.

The event is July 16 at Argosy Casino, in the evening.

Hourly Range: $39.00-$75.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:43 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Local Videographer & Photographer - Greenville, SC - Upwork
item.description:
We are a luxury marketing agency looking to hire freelance videographers and photographers and video editors in the Greenville, SC area. We're accumulating a list of talent that will be on the radar for future projects and for extra help during busy seasonal times.

Architectural photography, architectural videography and high-end editing/production skills  (or all of the above) are a huge plus.

Our clients are very high-end homebuilders, boutique hotels, wine bars etc.

please check us out at anvilmarketingco.com.

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:37 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Drone Videography, Videography, Architectural Photography, Real Estate Video, Video Editing & Production, Video Production, Photography, Photo Editing, Event Photography
Skills: Drone Videography, Videography, Architectural Photography, Real Estate Video, Video Editing & Production, Video Production, Photography, Photo Editing, Event Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Looking to make a 3 minute mashup - Upwork
item.description:

I have basic music and video production skills, but am looking for someone with more experience to help me take this to the next level.

I have the songs picked out and overall idea ready to go!
